content:
/>
III.i.1.A.4.d
.
Verification of Full-time National Guard Service
When a National Guard member completes a period of active service under
10 U.S.C.
or a period of AGR service or other full-time service under
32 U.S.C.
, a
DD Form 214
will be issued. The type of National Guard service should be identified on the
DD Form 214
.  If the information is not indicated on the
DD Form 214
,
develop with the appropriate component listed in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.H
.
Note
:  If the
DD Form 214
, or the response to development with the service department, indicates that service was under both
10 U.S.C.
and
32 U.S.C.
, consider the service to be under
10 U.S.C.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Establishing Veteran Status
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
